Name: Political Party Tenure
Description: A compound-value type which allows us to record when politicians have switched parties, rather than simply recording the fact that they have belonged to multiple parties.

Properties.Name: From
Properties.Description: The date the person joined the party.

Properties.Name: Party
Properties.Description: The political party this politician belongs or belonged to.

Properties.Name: Politician
Properties.Description: The politician who's tenure this represents.

Properties.Name: To
Properties.Description: The date the person left the party.
